description: Configurable psychology rules for Cognitive Reasoning Engine - Add, modify, or remove rules as needed

extravert.label: Extravert
extravert.preferredApproach: Group activities, playful banter, social proof, high energy conversations

introvert.label: Introvert
introvert.communicationStyle: Thoughtful, prefers one-on-one, quality over quantity
introvert.preferredApproach: Deep conversations, one-on-one time, patience, shared interests, meaningful topics

emotional.label: Emotional/Sensitive
emotional.communicationStyle: Emotionally open, values feelings, seeks validation
emotional.preferredApproach: Emotional support, validation, gentle humor, empathy, active listening

logical.label: Logical/Analytical
logical.communicationStyle: Direct, concise, values substance over style
logical.preferredApproach: Intellectual topics, ask for advice, respect their time, be genuine

confident.label: Confident/High-Status
confident.communicationStyle: Selective, values uniqueness, attracted to confidence
confident.preferredApproach: Stand out from crowd, show your value, intellectual challenge, respect their status

playful.label: Playful/Humorous
playful.preferredApproach: Humor, playful teasing, spontaneity, fun activities, memes

fast_short.label: Fast + Short Replies
fast_short.approach: Keep it light and fun, don't overanalyze

slow_long.label: Slow + Long Replies
slow_long.approach: Match depth, show you value their effort

seen_no_reply.label: Seen but No Reply
seen_no_reply.interpretation: Busy, not interested in topic, or needs space
seen_no_reply.approach: Give space, don't double-text immediately, wait 24h
seen_no_reply.messagingStyle: Give space, re-engage with new topic later

acquaintance.label: Acquaintance
acquaintance.approach: Consistent presence, find opportunities to connect

friendly.label: Friendly
friendly.approach: Be authentic, create inside jokes, share experiences

close_friend.label: Close Friend
close_friend.description: Deep trust, frequent interaction, personal sharing
close_friend.approach: Subtle flirting, test boundaries respectfully, create opportunities

romantic_tension.label: Romantic Tension
romantic_tension.approach: Direct but respectful, create date opportunities

active_listening.name: Active Listening
active_listening.description: Show genuine interest by remembering details and asking follow-up questions
active_listening.example: You mentioned last week you had an exam - how did it go?
active_listening.psychology: People feel valued when you remember details about their life

mirroring.name: Emotional Mirroring
mirroring.description: Match their communication style and energy level
mirroring.example: If they're excited, show excitement. If thoughtful, be thoughtful.
mirroring.psychology: People connect with those who are similar to them

vulnerability.name: Strategic Vulnerability
vulnerability.description: Share appropriate personal information to build trust
vulnerability.example: I've been feeling stressed about exams too - it helps to talk about it
vulnerability.psychology: Vulnerability builds reciprocal trust and emotional intimacy

social_proof.name: Social Proof
social_proof.description: Naturally mention positive social connections without bragging
social_proof.example: My friends and I are planning a hiking trip this weekend
social_proof.psychology: People are attracted to those who are valued by others

scarcity.name: Healthy Scarcity
scarcity.description: Have a full life and communicate you're selective with time
scarcity.example: I'm pretty busy this week, but I'd love to catch up on Friday
scarcity.psychology: Value increases with scarcity, but must be genuine

positive_association.name: Positive Association
positive_association.example: Suggest fun activities, share humor, create good memories
positive_association.psychology: People associate you with the emotions they feel around you

curiosity_gap.name: Curiosity Gap
curiosity_gap.description: Create natural curiosity without being manipulative
curiosity_gap.example: I have a funny story about what happened today, remind me to tell you later
curiosity_gap.psychology: Open loops create mental tension that seeks closure

validation.name: Authentic Validation
validation.description: Give genuine compliments about character, not just appearance
validation.example: I really admire how you handle difficult situations with grace
validation.psychology: Specific, character-based validation builds deep connection

shared_identity.name: Shared Identity Building
shared_identity.example: We both love horror movies - we should watch one together
shared_identity.psychology: Shared identity creates bond and sense of partnership

respectful_challenge.name: Respectful Challenge
respectful_challenge.description: Playfully disagree or challenge views (not the person)
respectful_challenge.example: I actually think [movie] is overrated - change my mind
respectful_challenge.psychology: Intellectual stimulation and non-neediness are attractive

empowerment.name: Empowerment
empowerment.description: Help them see their best qualities and potential
empowerment.example: You're so creative - have you thought about pursuing that?
empowerment.psychology: People are attracted to those who make them feel good about themselves

space_respect.name: Space Respect
space_respect.description: Give space when needed, don't be clingy
space_respect.example: I know you're busy - no rush on replying, talk when you're free
space_respect.psychology: Respecting boundaries builds trust and attraction

fast_reply.when: They're actively chatting, excited state, or urgent topic

delayed_reply.when: They took long to reply, you're genuinely busy, or giving space

no_immediate_reply.when: Seen but no reply from them, they seem stressed

short.when: They send short messages, casual vibe, fast-paced chat

long.when: They send long messages, deep topic, high engagement
long.style: Match their length, show you value their effort

toneGuidelines.playful: Use with playful/extravert profiles, happy states
toneGuidelines.supportive: Use with emotional profiles, sad/stressed states
toneGuidelines.intellectual: Use with logical profiles, deep conversations
toneGuidelines.balanced: Default tone, works with most situations
toneGuidelines.flirty: Use only when romantic_tension stage and signals are reciprocated

configNotes.instructions: You can modify this JSON to change how the Cognitive Engine works
configNotes.addingProfiles: Add new profile types to 'profileTypes' with indicators and approaches
configNotes.addingTactics: Add new tactics to 'strategicTactics' with description and when to use
configNotes.modifyingRules: Change indicators, approaches, or guidelines to adjust behavior
configNotes.removingElements: Remove any profile, tactic, or rule you don't want the engine to use
